creator: Saint John of Kronstadt
description: LibriVox recording of My Life in Christ: Extracts from the Diary of Saint John of Kronstadt by Saint John of Kronstadt. (Translated by E. E. Goulaeff.) Read in English. Moments of Spiritual Serenity and Contemplation, of Reverent Feeling, of Earnest Self-Amendment, and of Peace in God. For further information, including links to online text, reader information, RSS feeds, CD cover or other formats (if available), please go to the LibriVox catalog page for this recording. For more free audio books or to become a volunteer reader, visit LibriVox.org.
subject: librivox; audiobooks;devotional literature
